turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Volkswagen 1-litre car.
turn.2: Of the 250 units to be produced, 200 were be sold to retail customers.
turn.3: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.4: Volkswagen opened a registration process for interested customers that closed on 18 October 2013.
turn.5: What happened after the registration process closed?
turn.6: Because more than 200 potential buyers registered, a draw was conducted to select the customers with a purchase option for the available cars.
turn.7: Did those customers eventually buy the car?
turn.8: They were offered a purchase contract and after the payment of a deposit, the purchase agreement for a XL1 was binding.
turn.9: Did the car win any awards or honors?
turn.10: The Volkswagen XL1 was selected in February 2014 as one of the top five finalists for the 2014 World Car of the Year.
